faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: We answer your most common questions about Frutia

q1.question: Does Frutia replace a nutritionist?
q1.answer: Frutia isn't meant to replace a clinical nutrition professional — it acts as your digital nutrition coach for everyday decisions. It analyzes your goals, habits, preferences and food availability to create and adjust personalized plans. When changes happen, AI adapts your plan automatically. For medical conditions or clinical needs, professional guidance is still essential. In those cases, Frutia works as a smart companion between visits.

q2.question: What if I don't have certain foods from the plan?
q2.answer: No problem. Frutia adapts to what you actually have. It offers equivalent substitutions across macronutrients so you can build meals flexibly. If something is missing — or you just want to swap — AI reorganizes your meal in seconds while keeping your goals intact.

q3.question: Can I use Frutia if I have dietary restrictions?
q3.answer: Yes. You can register allergies, intolerances and preferences from the start. Frutia automatically excludes restricted foods and intelligently rebuilds your plan with safe and practical alternatives so you can keep progressing.

q4.question: What happens if I go off the plan?
q4.answer: Frutia doesn't punish you. If you have an off-plan meal, the AI analyzes it and adjusts the rest of the day to help balance calories and macros. It turns detours into smart adjustments so you can move forward without guilt.

q5.question: Can I export my plan?
q5.answer: Yes — you can review your history and download a PDF, ideal for your own tracking or to share with a coach or nutritionist.

q6.question: Is Frutia right for me?
q6.answer: Yes. Frutia is designed for real people, not just athletes or those seeking extreme physical transformations. The app works both for those who train and for those who simply want to feel better, improve their health, and organize their nutrition without complications. Frutia adapts to different goals and contexts, including people who have struggled to create a meal plan that fits their daily reality. If you have nutritional deficiencies, restrictions, limited time, or simply don't know where to start, Frutia guides you step by step, helping you build a plan that makes sense for you and that you can sustain over time.

q7.question: How does Frutia create my nutrition plan?
q7.answer: Frutia creates your nutrition plan based on who you are and what you actually need, not from a generic template. The app considers your goal, activity level, dietary preferences, restrictions, allergies, and the foods you enjoy or prefer to avoid. With this information, Frutia builds a flexible daily plan with options by macronutrient group, so you can choose meals that fit your tastes and routine. Beyond calories, Frutia prioritizes that your nutrition is functional, sustainable, and coherent with you. If you don't like a food, if you're allergic, or if you need to make changes, the AI adjusts the plan automatically to stay aligned with your wellbeing and goals.

q8.question: What makes Frutia different from other nutrition apps?
q8.answer: The main difference is that Frutia doesn't just track what you eat: it accompanies you and makes decisions with you. While many apps simply count calories or show numbers, Frutia uses artificial intelligence to interpret your context, detect imbalances, and propose practical solutions in real time. If you change a food, go off plan, or your routine shifts, Frutia responds and adjusts. Frutia combines planning, tracking, and continuous support in one place, transforming nutrition into a more flexible, intelligent, and sustainable process.

howItWorks.title: HOW DOES
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your relationship with food

step1.title: We define your path
step1.description: You answer a few questions about yourself, your goal and your context. In seconds Frutia knows your real starting point.

step2.title: We accompany you every day
step2.description: Your personal coach in your pocket: guides you in real time, adjusts the plan if life changes and celebrates every step.

step3.title: You sustain the process
step3.description: See your weekly progress, streaks and automatic adjustments. Consistency without effort.

differentiators.title: Why
differentiators.subtitle: It's not a calorie counter; it's designed to help you move forward even when the plan fails.

card1.title: Criteria
card1.description:
Frutia doesn't apply rigid rules.
It decides based on your goal, your context, and your day.
It doesn't punish mistakes: it adjusts the course.

card2.title: Support
card2.description:
It doesn't disappear after giving you a plan.
It's there when you doubt, improvise, or need to decide fast.

card3.title: Continuity
card3.description:
It doesn't depend on extreme discipline or perfect weeks.
It helps you keep moving forward even when a day doesn't go as expected.

differentiators.statement: Frutia is not just another app

comparison2.frutia: Frutia tells you what to do with them.

finalStatement.bold: Logging what you eat changes nothing.
finalStatement.subtext:
What changes is having the criteria when things get messy.
Frutia intervenes, guides, and keeps you on track even when the day isn't perfect.

features.title: Everything you need in
features.subtitle: Functionalities designed to help you achieve your goals sustainably

feature1.title: Exact macros by goal
feature1.description: Cut, maintain or bulk: Frutia calculates calories and macros and adjusts them with your progress.

feature2.title: Plan by options
feature2.description: Choose 1 option per group to build your meal. More flexible and easier to follow.

feature3.title: If you go off plan, it readjusts your day
feature3.description: Ate something off plan: Frutia gives you options to compensate without falling into 'all or nothing'.

feature4.title: AI Chat (text and voice)
feature4.description: Questions, doubts, substitutions, portions, recipes. Your assistant always available.

feature5.title: Visual tracking
feature5.description: Daily summary by macros, history and PDF export.
